title: Rename website to Studio-V
description:
Update all branding from 'Nano Banana Pro' to 'Studio-V':
- Update page title and metadata in layout.tsx
- Update header branding in page.tsx
- Update any references in components

title: Build Digital Marketing Agency Pipeline
description:
Major feature: Transform the app into a full pipeline for digital marketing agency.

## New Flow
1. Receive product details from sellers (name, description, variants, images)
2. Reimagine images into JSON prompts for AI generation
3. Store both original and generated images
4. Manage all data (sellers, products, media)

## Data Entities
- Sellers: client/brand information
- Products: name, description, variants (colors, sizes), linked to seller
- Media: original images, generated images, linked to products

## Sub-tasks needed
- Database schema for sellers, products, media
- Seller management UI (CRUD)
- Product management UI with variants
- Media gallery (before/after)
- Pipeline workflow UI

title: Design database schema for sellers, products, and media
description:
Create Supabase tables:
- sellers: id, name, email, phone, company, notes, created_at
- products: id, seller_id, name, description, status, created_at
- product_variants: id, product_id, name (e.g. 'Red', 'Large'), sku
- media: id, product_id, variant_id, type (original/generated), url, json_prompt, created_at

title: Build Seller Management UI
description:
CRUD interface for managing sellers/clients:
- List all sellers with search/filter
- Create new seller form
- Edit seller details
- Delete seller (with confirmation)
- View seller's products

title: Build Product Management UI
description:
CRUD interface for products with variants:
- List products (filterable by seller, status)
- Create product with name, description, seller link
- Add/edit/remove variants (colors, sizes, etc.)
- Upload original product images
- View product pipeline status

title: Build Media Gallery
description:
Gallery for viewing and managing all media:
- Grid view of all images
- Filter by: product, seller, type (original/generated)
- Before/after comparison view
- Download generated images
- View associated JSON prompt

title: Build Pipeline Workflow UI
description:
Main workflow interface connecting all pieces:
- Select product/variant to process
- Upload or select existing original images
- Generate JSON prompt using AI vision
- Edit JSON in Monaco editor
- Generate new image (connect to image gen API)
- Save generated image to media gallery
- Update product status (pending â†’ processed)

title: Set up navigation and app structure
description:
Create app navigation structure:
- Sidebar with nav links: Dashboard, Sellers, Products, Pipeline, Media Gallery
- Route structure: /sellers, /products, /pipeline, /media
- Dashboard showing overview stats
